tweet: Today, and everyday, I am thankful for my family, this country, and the opportunity to serve you. Happy Thanksgiving! pic.twitter.com/xvHC0JDuZa

I’m proud to see a Utah high school sophomore advocating on behalf of this unit. https://www.ksl.com/article/46193468/descendants-of-wwii-ghost-army-soldiers-want-them-to-officially-be-recognized …

This week I signed on to The Ghost Army Congressional Gold Medal Act. This legislation honors a top-secret unit that used inflatable tanks & sound effects to deceive the Germans in WWII. Due to the secrecy of the operation, these American heroes were never recognized.

Continuing Resolutions are an irresponsible way to fund our government and military. Today's CR was no exception. Not only does it lack funds to secure our border, it does not give our troops the pay raise they deserve. Our troops deserve better.

This is a proud moment for every American. The FCC is announcing they are ready to begin the formal process to designate 9-8-8 as the new 3 digit code for the national suicide hotline. This morning I sent a letter to Chairman Schiff requesting a correction to accurately reflect my attendance at two  depositions. I have reviewed every transcript with counsel & other committee members. To suggest that I am unfamiliar with the testimony of any witness is absurd. pic.twitter.com/mD1hyD1FqM

I have attended every single deposition that has been held while Congress was in session. Misleading reports failed to mention the inaccuracy of the attendance records & many of these depositions were scheduled while Congress was out of town, with the intention to be staff led.
